trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_SEQ_00<tab>This mild-mannered Mol needs the aid of a warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and slay any beasts that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_000<tab>You there! You look like you have slain a beast or two.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_001<tab>I was told today by the udgan that the gods want me to slay a beast by the Dusk Throne.

TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_002<tab>However, I have never even killed an insect. And I am certainly far too weak to take on any of the creatures that dwell near the Dusk Throne. Oh, why did the gods ask this of me?
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_100_002<tab>Could you slay the creature in my stead? The udgan did not specify that the beast need be slain by my hand.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_003<tab>Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find. You are my only hope!
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_004<tab>Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_012<tab>Ha ha, now I see why the gods gave me this task!

TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_013<tab>I have been working on a set of armor ordered by a Budugan warrior for a few days now. However, no matter how hard I tried, I could not think of an appropriate design.
TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_014<tab>But hearing you slayed an anala has made up my mind. I shall give the armor a fiery design! That should suit a brave warrior like him nicely.

TEXT_STMBDZ622_02800_GENTLEMAN02800_000_015<tab>Thank you for all of your help. Do not hesitate to let me know in the future if you have a problem of your own! Perhaps the gods will be able to guide you too.
